summary: Frontend-only testing completed for PROTOCOL_V Valentine's Day app. All requested features are working correctly: MidwayCheckpoint page, DayCompletionPage integration in Protocols 005-007, single 'Yes, Forever' button in ProtocolFinal, and photo integrations.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All emotional journey enhancements verified. MidwayCheckpoint shows after Protocol004 completion. Protocols 005-007 use DayCompletionPage. ProtocolFinal has single 'Yes, Forever' button. Dog photo (Scotch) in Protocol007, couple photo in ProtocolFinal response phase. DEV MODE enabled (accessGranted: true). localStorage key: 'valentine_protocol_progress'.
